english.segment7: We call upon the name of the Lord
english.segment8: No other one, You are the one
english.segment9: For great is Your love poured out for us
english.segment10: Be lifted up, be lifted up
english.segment16: You gave it all for us
english.segment17: You gave it all for us
english.segment19: We call upon the name of the Lord
english.segment20: No other one, You are the one
english.segment21: For great is Your love poured out for us
english.segment22: Be lifted up, be lifted up
english.segment27: We stand in awe of who You are
